name: But Ace Here Said You Deserved It!!
effect:
[Main] You may rest 4 of your DON!! cards: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Meteor Fist
effect: [Main] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −5000 power during this turn.

name: Gum-Gum Gatling Gun
effect: [Main] Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your [Monkey.D.Luffy] cards. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

name: Gum-Gum Elephant Gun
effect: [Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less. Then, set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active at the end of this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

name: Gum-Gum Snake Shot
effect: [Counter] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

name: I Know You're Strong... So I'll Go All Out from the Very Start!!!
effect:
[Main] You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: Up to 2 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 7 or less will not become active in your opponent's next Refresh Phase.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: If I Bowed Down to Power, What's the Point in Living?
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If you have 1 or less Life cards, your opponent cannot activate [Blocker] whenever your Leader attacks during this turn.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Phoenix Pyreapple
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Brilliant Punk
effect: [Main] You may return 1 of your Characters to the owner's hand: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less to the owner's hand.

name: Guess We'll Have Another Scrap. You Can Only Risk Death While You're Still Alive!!
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Gol.D.Roger] and you have any DON!! cards given, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Divine Departure
effect:
[Main] You may rest 5 of your DON!! cards: If you have any DON!! cards given, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −8000 power during this turn.
[Counter] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Divine Departure
effect:
[Main] You may rest 5 of your DON!! cards: If you have any DON!! cards given, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −8000 power during this turn.
[Counter] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Go All the Way to the Top!!
effect:
[Main] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: If you have any DON!! cards given, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 base power or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 base power or less.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: The Five Elders Are at Your Service!!!
effect: [Main] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Celestial Dragons} type card other than [The Five Elders Are at Your Service!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

name: The World's Equilibrium Cannot Be Maintained Forever
effect:
[Main] You may rest 5 of your DON!! cards: If the only Characters on your field are {Celestial Dragons} type Characters, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 6 or less.
[Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Never Existed... in the First Place...
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Imu], K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Stages with a cost of 7.
[Counter] If your Leader is [Imu], up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

name: Paper Art Afterimage
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. Then, if your opponent has 2 or less Life cards, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

name: The One Who Is the Most Free Is the Pirate King!!!
effect: [Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Gum-Gum Dawn Stamp
effect: [Main] You may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-up: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 6 or less.
